channel.title: Anfernio for unban?
channel.description:
Hello. I am detective Lawrence and I represent Anfernio, also known as Anthony.
Anfernio was banned for trolling - an activity done by anyone in the internet and the real world - yet it is not classified in the rules.
Y U NO JUSTIFY BAN MOPAR STAFF? [img]http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lflcwlDntN1qbp9xe.png[/img]
